short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A chrome extension that provides an eco-friendly assessment of websites.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A chrome extension that provides an eco-friendly assessment of websites, allowing users to make informed decisions about the environmental impact of their online activity. It displays a green smiley icon for websites that have been certified as sustainable by The Green Web Foundation. This would give users a quick and easy way to identify environmentally responsible websites and support businesses that prioritize sustainability. The Green Web Foundation is an independent non-profit that tracks how much of the internet runs on green energy. 

Join the Green Web Revolution with this Chrome extension that calculates your green web page access percentage - it's like having your own personal eco-meter for the internet!
